name: Mission Groundhog
description:
Play as Greg, a new recruit to the United Groundhog Society (UGHS) intelligence department. He is equipped with a self rewind watch, which also has a side effect of keeping him in time loops. Can you help him overcome the Weasels of Wesselton?

Entered for Brackey's 2020.2 Game Jam.
